description: Try our easy to follow Hoisin–chilli Duck Wraps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hoisin–chilli Duck Wraps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C (Gas 4). Rub 1 tbs soy sauce, 1 tsp honey, and 1/4tsp Chinese five spice powder into 2 duck legs. Cover tightly with foil (no gaps) and roast for 1 hour, or until starting to fall apart.

Remove the meat off the legs and shred, then mix in 2 tbs hoisin sauce. Warm 3 tortillas. Spread meat over each wrap and scatter with 1 thumb julienned fresh ginger, 1 seeded and julienned red chilli, 1/2 cucumber, julienned, and 10g chopped coriander.
Roll up. Slice off the last 5cm and wrap for 1 hour before slicing.
